name: Shipgrave's Secret
description:
Synopsis: 

Valjas is a headhunter who makes a living of stealing bad guys and claiming their reward.

Valjas heard some rumors about a valuable chest hidden in a cave and guarded by strange people. One day, he decided to explore the cave and see what is hidden in the chest. Valjas found some strange dagger that was able to speak and then the dagger told him to kill the enemies in exchange of power.

Join Valjas in this adventure and see what happens with him and the demonic dagger.

Authors:

Programmers: Joel Gallarte, Xavier Torrent, David López

Designers: Joel Gallarte,  David López

Artists: Sergi Pinto, Gerard Galicia, Xavier Gesa
